transcript: the worst advice for me was always taking the safer route there's plenty of people that would probably have better been served taking the safer out but for me not quitting my job that would have been terrible advice and the same degree when I made the decision I wanted to sell my gyms not selling them would have been terrible advice given who I was then now the person that I am now probably could have continued to scale my location from 6 to 20 to 50 to 100 and maybe 10 years later I would have 400 locations right now and maybe I'd be wealthier in terms of net worth I don't know but I don't think I was the person then that could have done that and stuck with it I'm wealthier now because I'm more patient
